message:
Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product I have to offer is truly unique and holds immense value, much like a rare gem that has been meticulously crafted over time. It's worth $1,200,000 to you, but I understand that negotiations are key in such transactions.

I am proposing to sell this exceptional item to you at a price of $1,150,000. This offer represents a significant saving for you, while still allowing me to recognize its true worth. I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement that respects both our interests.

Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further. I am here to answer any questions you might have and to ensure that you fully appreciate the value this product brings to your life.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice
